description:
# Create an Product

Product is a product, of a or service offered by your company, or something you buy as a part of your supplies or raw materials.

Products are integral to everything you do in ERPNext - from billing, purchasing to managing inventory. Everything you buy or sell, whether it is a physical product or a service is an Product. Products can be stock, non-stock, variants, serialized, batched, assets etc.
name: Create an Product
title: Create an Product
